title: Jolbors
author: Jolbors
created_time: June 08, 2023, 02:57:40 PMLast edit: June 17, 2023, 10:50:19 PM by Jolbors
content: I would like to briefly tell you about myself. My name is Dan , and I have been a crypto enthusiast since 2015. Initially, I was thrilled by cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology. I decided to develop a program for implementing blockchain technology in government agencies. I proposed this program to all the politicians in Kyrgyzstan but faced rejection every time. It was clear that they did not want to lose the opportunity to accept bribes if blockchain were implemented in elections and statistics. Fortunately, I found a well-known politician who agreed to adopt this technology, but there was a problem - he was in prison. In late September 2020 he published the program on Facebook, and in October, a revolution occurred, and he became the President. During the campaign, he spoke about his intention to implement blockchain, but after the elections, he backed out of the idea and stopped collaborating with me. By the way I wrote a programme to him for free. Before we did not sign an agreement but how could I sign an agreement with him while he was in jail?  Here is his programme: https://www.facebook.com/profile/100004948146129/search/?q=%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F I am starting to educate the people again, as I always do, from scratch. I have an idea to create a quasi-state with implemented solutions, where people can witness my work and realize that the time for change has come. Currently, our country is within the sphere of influence of three empires, and they even control the digitization of government structures. Witnessing the hopeless situation, I have decided to embark on my own path as a Mandalorian and enlighten the people. I am confident that I will be able to accomplish my vision. PS He became a Dictator and I am feeling a responsibility that I helped him to become a president. I feel that he doesn't want to be indebted to anyone, and any mention of him owing someone is met with imprisonment, thus he incarcerated many of his allies. He believes he became the president on his own and that no one helped him. He has turned into a super dragon and a dictator. It's possible that I could be imprisoned too, as I openly expressed my opinions about his tyranny.

comments.body: Mr Diniar, after reading your post I just realized that how a person can change his mind when the power comes in his hands. The guy that became president did a very wrong act by forgetting the favor that the supporters have done for him, and your idea of implementing Bitcoin was a really good thing but the politicians are always like that and they don't allow anything to be a reality which can harm their current system. The democracy gets affected by such politicians because they know that a technology like blockchain could make the elections transparent and with transparent elections only the real politicians with huge vote bank gets elected as president or prime  minister. I hope that people may respect your opinion regarding implementing blockchain into the election systems.For your own safety it's better that you should not oppose the guy directly because in such cases you might be against the state where you are living and that could create more problems in your life. I recommend you to wait for the proper time to take further actions in order to accomplish your goal of fair elections with the help of blockchain.

comments.author: Jolbors
comments.body: Blockchain technology, in and of itself, is not a solution to all societal and political issues. It is a decentralized and transparent system that can potentially bring some benefits, such as increased transparency, improved security, and reduced corruption in certain areas. However, its effectiveness depends on how it is implemented and integrated into existing systems.Regarding the claim that blockchain technology can stop melting glaciers or solve all environmental problems, that seems highly unlikely. Blockchain technology is primarily a tool for managing and verifying transactions and data, and it does not have the ability to directly impact or control physical phenomena like glacier melting. Environmental issues require comprehensive solutions that involve various factors, including policy changes, technological advancements, and collective efforts.
